rect.desc: There's a dashboard and a roadmap view.
rect.title: View selector

rect.desc: Projects are grouped by business functions here. This can be any sort of hierarchy and can have more levels, and maybe collapsible.
rect.title: Business areas and related projects

rect.desc: If a task/feature doesn't end in the viewport, it is indicated using a different terminator.
rect.title: Continued task terminator

path.desc: The "Today" line shows where in the timeline one currently is.
path.title: The Today Line

path.desc: Status and completion icons and guages show how complete the project is. The completion is also indicated using a progress-bar-like gradient in the body of the task.
path.title: Status indicators

rect.desc: DIfferent 'flavours' indicate type of tasks and features. These are used to color-code each task. It's useful to categorize and filter based on these.
rect.title: Flavours

rect.desc: Triggers for showing the statistics and filter panels.
rect.title: Statistics and Filters

rect.desc: Search for anything: roadmap items, assignees, time periods (after: mm/dd/yyyy), flavours.
rect.title: Fuzzy Search

circle.desc: Triggers the panel for creating a new roadmap item.
circle.title: New Roadmap Item Trigger
